name: Star.P.G.
description:
Arcade style, Side scrolling space shooter.
With over 16k lines of code, rich in features and variety, this game is sure to please. Battle your way through hordes of enemies who increase in difficulty, and defeat the seven big bosses! Earn achievements as you gain score and kills! Customize your star-ship with various weapons, shields and thrusters!
And don't forget to save your game!

Features:

- Multiple Language support. (Can add more if requested.)
- Particle engine, fire, smoke and shrapnel!
- Customizable spaceship.
- Six unique experience based weapons each with three levels, all
having unique sounds, movements and power-ups.
- Five different shields.
- Three different thrusters.
- Bomb and health support drops.
- Various power-ups.
- Four unique side helper ships, with unique weapons and/or effects!
Each having 3 levels of awesomeness!!!
- Achievement system, kills, score.
- Twenty five unique levels all with different enemies and
background music!
- Twenty five different enemies with unique sound effects,
projectiles and movements.
